channel.title: Vps help
channel.description:
hey guys im kinda new to the vps thing .. but i like to know all details of vps like how it is .. is it a program?
and if i buy one does it get on my destkop .. ? or what ..
and which site is the best to buy one .

item.title: Vps help
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

The term, virtual, in VPS is “an adjective that describes something which is not tangible or an actual thing.”

So how on earth would you be able to put something on your desktop that is ‘virtual’?

Anyway, here’s the answer to your question: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429240.0.html

Read full topic
